# DATAFILE::DATADICT_CREATE_ARRAY

## Summary
Adds an array object to the specified dictionary

## Parameters
* **DATAFILE_DICT** parent: The dictionary object
* **STRING** name: The name of the data item

## Returns
* **DATAFILE_ARRAY**: A new (empty) array object

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This will overwrite any existing entry in the parent dictionary
